scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: S.
scrape.text: Well, this had me gagging on my soup with confusion, shock and voyeuristic glee. I read this family drama in three days. I was happy not to even have read the back blurb before starting, so I had no idea what was going to go down. Itâ€™s suspenseful and foreboding and has a nicely paced reveal, like a wine that tastes wonderful, but whose proof you neglect to check before downing three glasses of it.
